ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: This gives you +3armor which soul ring does not.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Convert your hood to pipe so you are a team player because dota is a team game.
ItemTooltips.assault: Extra armor + armor debuff for extra W damage.
ItemTooltips.heart: Gives you much needed health so you arn't burst down.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: If you are pitted against team stun/aoe.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Armor + slow down enemies for chase.
ItemTooltips.vanguard: Avg time for vanguard is 10-12. Consider blademail if you're getting dominated. Lets you dive towers.
ItemTooltips.blade_mail: Makes you bristlefront bristleside and bristleback.
ItemTooltips.hood_of_defiance: Reason why you take this over BKB is because you want to take damage to your back and get those extra sprays.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: If they have a hard right click carry.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: Take this over treads if you're having a hard time.

AbilityTooltips.bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo: When this skill is level 1, try to get 1 stack on each hero so you don't give them stick charges. Getting this level 1 helps you out in sticky situations (kill me).
AbilityTooltips.bristleback_quill_spray: Like a FPS, you need to press W to walk.  Don't spam this at level 1/2 because of your mana pool. Instead, try harassing and getting kills at level 3+.
AbilityTooltips.bristleback_bristleback: Main passive making you super tank. Consider getting level 1 during hard lane.
AbilityTooltips.bristleback_warpath: Spam for W to run away faster or for more damage.
